General.Name: Chengdu Rainbow Appliance Gr
General.Description: Chengdu Rainbow Appliance (Group) Shares Co., Ltd. produces and sells household flexible heating electrical products and appliances in China. It offers electric blankets, hand warmers, and cloaks; body warmers, and other indoor and outdoor heating products; household hygiene and insecticidal products, such as electric and disc type mosquito coils, insecticidal aerosols, mosquito repellent stickers and liquid, and other indoor and outdoor insect repellent and mosquito repellent supplies; and chemical fibers, non-woven fabrics, agricultural spray equipment, masks, etc. The company is based in Chengdu, China.
